## Deploy Badge

**Generate a deployment badge for your project's README.**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/therealsujitk/deploy-badge)
[![ref-online-tool]](https://deploy-badge.vercel.app/)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://github.com/therealsujitk/deploy-badge?tab=readme-ov-file#usage)

### Parameters

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-querys] | | | | | |
| `url` | `string` | `true` |  | The URL of the project to be checked |  |
| `style` | `string` |  | `flat` | Badge style | Supported: `flat` `flat-square` `for-the-badge` `plastic`. |
| `logo` | `string` |  |  | Logo style | Refer: [shields.io](https://shields.io/docs/logos). |
| `name` | `string` |  |  | Badge name |  |

</details>

```txt
https://deploy-badge.vercel.app/{?url,style,logo,name}
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

```markdown
<!-- https://xiaohuohumax.github.io/readme-widget-hub/ -->
![Deploy Badge](https://deploy-badge.vercel.app/?url=https://xiaohuohumax.github.io/readme-widget-hub/&logo=github&name=Github+Page)
```

<div>
  <img src="https://deploy-badge.vercel.app/?url=https://xiaohuohumax.github.io/readme-widget-hub/&#38;logo=github&#38;name=Github+Page" alt="Deploy Badge" />
</div>
